Blood

Understanding Blood: Your Lifesaving Gift

Every drop of blood you donate can save lives. Whether it's for accident victims, patients undergoing surgery, or individuals with medical conditions, your donation makes a significant impact.

Types of Donations

  • Whole Blood Donation
  • Platelet Donation
  • Plasma Donation
  • Double Red Cell Donation

Hunger Free Nandyal

According to the world statistics from THE WORLD COUNTS Around 9 million people die every year of hunger and hunger-related diseases. Surveys further says that a Child dies from hunger every 10 sec.

Friends For Seva wants to stop this through HUNGER FREE NANDYAL by providing Quality food for the people who are in need at Bus Stand, Railway Station, Govt Hospital etc.,

Make a difference with us! Our organization conducts blood donation events to assist patients in emergency need of blood

  • Aug 17, 2016 Blood Donation

    Phaneendra & Vishnu Gayathri

    "This couple organized a blood donation camp on their wedding day, and they actively participated by donating blood as well."

  • Dec 07, 2014 FFS Activities

    Left over food in messes

    "Daily lot of high quality food is left over in the messes in college which is just thrown away as they don't have to time to distribute to the needy. FFS team took that responsibility and distributed more that 30000 packets during college time."

  • Sep 27, 2013 FFS Activities

    Funds collection in college

    "FFS people have been doing service activities since 2009. Whenever people comes with a request of health issue or physical disability or any other thing, we will collect funds through out the college to collect funds and give it to the needy."

    Surya Teja & Bhavya

AVAIL COUPONS

eBLOOD

Embark on a journey of giving with Friends For Seva's innovative initiative, eBLOOD. We believe in the power of rewarding blood donors, and eBLOOD introduces an exciting way to give back to those who contribute to saving lives. By donating blood, you not only make a significant impact on the lives of those in need but also unlock exclusive offers as a token of our appreciation.

Exclusive Offers for Blood Donors :

  • One T-shirt from Friends For Seva
  • Flat 50% discount at Shankar Villas Restaurant, Nandyal
  • Flat 50% discount at Pizzeria, Nandyal
  • Flat 30% off at www.ruthuvu.com
  • Unbelievable offers at Sravan Dental Clinic
  • Huge promotions in Smart City Nandyal
  • One-week free breakfast at FFS Home
  • Appreciation Certificate from Friends For Seva
  • Appreciation Momento from Friends For Seva

...and many more exciting offers are in progress! Join eBLOOD today, be a hero, and enjoy the perks of being a lifesaver. Your contribution matters, and we're here to make sure you're recognized and rewarded for your generosity. Donate blood, save a life, and avail amazing coupons through eBLOOD!

Explore being a donor

Who can give blood ?

Generally, individuals aged 17-65, weighing at least 110 pounds, and in good health are eligible. Specific criteria may vary by location.

How often can I donate blood?

Whole blood donors can typically donate every 8 weeks, while platelet donation may have more frequent intervals.

Is it safe to donate blood ?

Yes, donating blood is safe, with strict protocols and trained staff ensuring a secure and comfortable experience.

What should I eat or avoid before donating blood?

Eat a nutritious meal, avoid fatty foods and alcohol, and stay hydrated; refer to your blood donation center's guidelines for personalized advice.

How will my donated blood be used?

The entire blood donation Donated blood is used for surgeries, trauma care, and treating medical conditions, playing a vital role in saving lives.

Contact Us

If you've got a question, get in touch. You can do this here online or by WhatsApp 7661 80 81 82

Donating blood not only saves lives but also has the potential to impact various medical treatments.
